documentation.title: ConcatenationSpacing
documentation.standard: This standard is about the spacing of concat strings
String concatenation operators must be surrounded by spaces

code.title: Valid: String concatenation operator surrounded by space
Invalid: String concatenation operator is not surrounded by space

documentation.standard: String concatenation operators should be surrounded by only one space

code.title: Valid: String concatenation operator surrounded by one space on every side
Invalid: String concatenation operator surrounded by multiple spaces
